name: A Prelude to an Adventure
description:
This game was made in two weeks for the LOWREZJAM 2020.

I guess the game itself would be best described as an interactive experience with light puzzle elements.
Sadly, a lot of the planned puzzles, interactions and even locations are still missing, because we simply ran out of time, but hopefully there will be a more polished and completed version released in the future.

Mouse:      

Left click - move around, interact, use inventory items
Right click - put away inventory item

Keyboard:

Move around with WASD keys
ESC - Main menu, close menus, skip animations
F5 -  Save menu
F7 -  Load menu
F9 -  Restart
F10 - Quit

Ctrl and Q - Instant quit
Alt and X - Abort game

Credits: 

Graphics, scripting, writing: Raimo Peterson
Music: Riho Peterson
